article.title: Bolivar Assigned to Joint Region Marianas
article.text: Rear Adm. Babette Bolivar, USN, will be assigned as commander, U.S. Pacific Command Representative, Guam, Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Federated States of Micronesia, Republic of Palau; commander, U.S. Naval Forces, Marianas and commander, Joint Region Marianas, Guam.Â
